title: FS: T206 Cobb (Bat On) Sovereign 350 SGC 60
author: slantycouch

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Cobb (Bat On) Sovereign 350 SGC 60
posts.post_content:
I believe I posted last year when I had this graded at the National. It belongs to a family friend and he's asked that I help him sell it. I have the card in-hand and will handle the transaction. I don't have too many posts here, but I will happily provide references if needed. Happy to provide additional scans if you need them as well. 

If anyone is interested, please contact me, thanks. 

Images here, and below: [url]http://www.collectorfocus.com/collection/SlantyCouch/my-collection[/url]

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/SlantyCouch/my-collection/2625/t206-cobb-bat-on[/IMG]

To anyone interested, you can absolutely buy with full confidence.
Chris is a super stand-up guy!

Hi All,

I received a bunch of PM's about this card and tried to juggle them all. If for some reason I missed yours, you have my apology. I finally got the seller to just come up with a price. He's looking for $2300 for this card. Price includes shipping, full insurance and Signature Confirmation. 

Again I have this card in hand and can ship immediately upon completed payment. 

If you are interested, please contact me. Thanks again.
